landing.bio: Hello! I am Saurabh Kumar Singh.Learning AI, DL and Video Analytics, A young enthusiastic boy carrying full of dreams in his eyes, having the hunger for technical skills.

experience.aboutWork: Working on NVIDIA's Jetson platform to provide AI at the EDGE.

Worked on Object Detection , Object Segmentation and other computer vision techniques for our custom dataset in Cricket. Worked on Text Detection in a video and then blur it and Annotated own dataset to train YOLO object detection model. Developed various POCs.
Developed health awareness Hindi android application. Used GOOGLE's Firebase to store the realtime and static database.

education.university: International Institute of Information Technology Naya Raipur

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a AI enthusiast, I enjoy to do some front end work working with HTML, JSX etc and exploring GitHub
interests.paragraphTwo: When at Home I use to play cricket and mobile games, watching some sci-fi web series, meeting with people.

awards.awardDetail: Star of The Month Award for Excellence work delivery at CodeVector Labs.
RunnerUP in Industry Academia Meet 2019, IIIT Naya Raipur.
Medhavi Chhatra Samman-2015 : Among Top 10 Meritorious Students in State.
